main event: A shape of flat iron, almost size of kite, white with black outline was observed on radar and visually from the ground in East Weymouth, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 minutes.
The object passed through the observer's field of vision.
The sighting occurred close to the South Weymouth Naval Air Station and Logan Airport.
The observer suggested the object could have been an IVY aircraft or test item from the South Weymouth test facility.
The report mentions that the sighting was unidentified, but possibly an aircraft or balloon.
sighted object: a flat, kite-sized white object with a black outline
